name: Desert Fox: Story of the Well
name_original: Desert Fox: Story of the Well
description:
• This is my first game I'm releasing and I've ever made. I did it in memory of my mother who was alive when the game was 70% finished, but unfortunately, she got sick and then I lost her. The game was supposed to come out on a mother's day, but I did not finish testing it.
  • But it's finished now and I hope you'll like it.
  • Desert Fox is a 2D platform with a combination of Trap levels with cartoon graphics and basic story.
  • Desert Fox is a full game (4-8h of gameplay) + joke permadeath mode. 
  • Before playing please go to the credits. Thank you.

Download  instructions:

  • Unzip
  • Play
  • Have Fun
